scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.start-server: pm2 start --name server server.js && pm2 logs server
scripts.restart-server: pm2 restart --name server server.js && pm2 logs server
scripts.start-maker: pm2 start --name maker maker.js && pm2 logs maker
scripts.restart-maker: pm2 restart --name maker maker.js && pm2 logs maker
